title: Corrections & Amplifications
text:
In some editions Monday, a photo of a Universal Studios theme-park ride incorrectly accompanied a Business & Finance article about Walt Disney Co.'s theme parks.

---

Netflix Inc.'s name was misspelled as Neflix in a photo caption with an Exchange article on Saturday about Ryan Cohen.

---

Readers can alert The Wall Street Journal to any errors in news articles by e-mailing wsjcontact@wsj.com or by calling 888-410-2667.
